targets.query:
from(bucket: "Q2")
  |> range(start: 2021-01-01)

from(bucket: "Q1")
  |> range(start: 2020-01-01)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "carbon_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.zone_id == "IT")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "carbon_mean" or r._field == "carbon_min" or r._field == "carbon_max")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "agg")

panels.title: Q1 - Italy vs Sweden, Carbon Intensity

targets.query:
from(bucket: "Q1")
  |> range(start: 2020-01-01)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "carbon_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.zone_id == "IT" or r.zone_id == "SE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "cfe_mean" or r._field == "cfe_min" or r._field == "cfe_max")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "agg")

from(bucket: "Q1")
  |> range(start: 2020-01-01)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "carbon_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.zone_id == "IT")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "carbon_mean")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "agg")

from(bucket: "Q1")
  |> range(start: 2020-01-01)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "carbon_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.zone_id == "IT")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "carbon_min")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "agg")

from(bucket: "Q1")
  |> range(start: 2020-01-01)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "carbon_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.zone_id == "IT")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "carbon_max")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "agg")
